Class Auth

  • java.lang.Object
    • Auth

  • public class Auth
extends java.lang.Object
    Shared class used by every sample. Contains methods for authorizing a user and caching credentials.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String CHANNEL_AUDIT_SCOPE
      Scope that allows retrieving the 'auditDetails' part in a 'channel' resource
      static HttpTransport HTTP_TRANSPORT
      Global instance of the HTTP transport.
      static JsonFactory JSON_FACTORY
      Global instance of the JSON factory.
      static java.lang.String MANAGE_SCOPE
      Scope that allows managing a YouTube account
      static java.lang.String UPLOAD_SCOPE
      Scope that allows uploading and managing YouTube videos of a YouTube account
      static java.lang.String VIEW_SCOPE
      Scope that allows only viewing a YouTube account

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Credential authorize()
      Authorizes the installed application to access user's protected data.
      java.lang.String revoke()
      Revoke all authorized tokens and remove the credential file, so that the next authorization is going to ask the user for permissions again.
      void setScopes(java.util.List<java.lang.String> scopes)
      Set a new list of scopes

      • revoke

        public java.lang.String revoke()
                        throws java.io.IOException,
                               java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Revoke all authorized tokens and remove the credential file, so that the next authorization is going to ask the user for permissions again.
        Returns:
        HTTP response codes from requests for revoking tokens
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
